about.title: About Me
about.text: MedicoreFly - saxophonist, multi-instrumentalist, session musician. A person who has devoted himself to music completely, enveloping his listeners with a wave of groove and style, performing instrumental compositions in genres such as Groove funk, Jazz standard, Acid jazz, Lounge, RnB, City Pop, Blues, and more. Playing the saxophone, he reveals a new facet of experiencing music in each composition, not limiting himself in the musical space, rethinking each melody, making every track unique. The repertoire of mFly is a complete reflection of his musical taste and playlist of favorite songs that inspire him on his creative journey, as the main message of mFly's music is to share beauty with the world and be yourself.
